CPTPlotSpaceAnnotation Class Reference

Positions a content layer relative to some anchor point in a plot space. More...

Detailed Description

Positions a content layer relative to some anchor point in a plot space.

Member Function Documentation

id CPTPlotSpaceAnnotation::initWithPlotSpace:anchorPlotPoint: ( CPTPlotSpace *  newPlotSpace,
[anchorPlotPoint] NSArray *  newPlotPoint 
) [virtual]

Initializes a newly allocated CPTPlotSpaceAnnotation object.

This is the designated initializer. The initialized layer will be anchored to a point in plot coordinates.

Parameters:
newPlotSpaceThe plot space which the anchor is defined in. Must be non-nil.
newPlotPointAn array of NSDecimalNumbers giving the anchor plot coordinates.
Returns:
The initialized CPTPlotSpaceAnnotation object.
